      • determinedExportFormat

        @WorkerThread
public int determinedExportFormat()
        Get the Export Format with determined AUTO value. @see #getExportFormat() This has to be executed in a background thread.
        Returns:
        the @EditorSaveSettings.FORMAT format int excluding AUTO
